SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 4th SEPTEMBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
(a) British Front. On the battle front our line runs LECLUSE, (inclusive), our patrols are in ECOURT ST. QUENTIN, BARALLE (inclusive), INCHY-EN-ARTOIS, (inclusive), we are in the middle of BOURSIES, DEMICOURT, (inclusive), HERMIES, (inclusive), 2,000 yards east of BERTINCOURT, thence generally along the CANAL DU NORD to MOISIAINS, thence 1,500 yards east of HAUT-ALLAINES, thence south-west to 500 yards east of MONT ST.QUENTIN, thence east of PERONNE.
On the LYS front we are in NIEPPE and south of it hold TOUCQUET-PARMENTIERES and JESUS FARMS. North of NIEPPE we hold ROMARIN. We are not in possession of LENS but have patrols in the western part of it.
(b) French Front. There is no charge in the general situation.
2. ITALIAN AND ACEDONIAN FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
4th September, 1918.
Issued at 1 p.m.
